resources.string: Simple Pacer App was created using open source technologies that were under the apache licence 2.0. And all code of the latest builds is posted live at http://github.com/allvens/allworkout

MPAndroidChart was use to present a chart in the log screen in the application of the users pass workouts. The library was not alternated or modified in anyway. Find out more at https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart

We take our customers privacy very seriously, so we make sure any and all data collected from the user is only stored locally and never shared to any outside source. Data collected is stored and used inorder for the app to function properly. To give users full transparency, this project is an open-source project, all code of the latest build can be found at http://github.com/allvens/workoutName.
This Privacy Policy applies to your use of the mobile application Simple Pacer App made available in the US version of the Google play store.

This Privacy Policy is apart of the End User License Agreement. The End User License Agreement governs your use and limits our liability to you. By using our application you agree in the form your data will be used in the way we described in the Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any of the terms of this Privacy Policy or the End User License Agreement, you may not use the application.
What Information We Collect And How It Is Used

The only data that is collected is required for the application to function which you provide by using the app. All collected data is done locally for the application\'s usability and no data is ever sent off to any outside source.
The types of data we collect
The Length of a Pacer Session ran.
A value representing whether the device will vibrate when instructed to.
A value representing whether the device will make a sound when instructed to.
A value representing whether the device will notify the user when instructed to.
A value representing the days the device will notify the user when instructed to.
A value representing the time the device will notify the user when instructed to.
All data collected is done locally and kept locally on the application. No data is of sent out to any outside source.
This application is not intended to be used by anyone under the age of 18. Children under the age of 18 should consult with their legal guardian first before using the application.

We reserve the right to amend this Privacy Policy at any time. Any time our privacy policies change, users will be aware to this by checking the effective date. Should material changes occur the user will be notified with accordance of legal requirement. By continuing to use the application after changes have been made, you are confirming that you have read, understood and consented to the latest version of this Privacy Policy.
If you have any questions or opinions regarding this Privacy Policy, you may contact us at allvensinc@gmail.com.

This End User License Agreement is a legal agreement between you and Allvens, that include action and use of the mobile application Simple Pacer App. Including any revisions, updates, and modifications.
BY USING THE APPLICATION YOU ACCEPT OUR TERMS OF SERVICE AS STATED BELOW AND PRIVACY POLICY. SHOULD YOU NOT ACCEPT OUR TERMS OR PRIVATE POLICY, YOU ARE NOT PERMITTED TO USE THIS APPLICATION
For information on the collecting, distributing, and usage of your data, view our privacy policy.
Anyone under the age of 18 is not authorized to use this application without the proper consent of a legal guardian..
Please contact us with any copyright infringement complaints at: allvensinc@gmail.com.

We have and will again make it clear that in no way is any of the pacer session making claims of weight loss or muscle gain. This application is mainly a tool of logging the given pacer session with suggested repetitions.

This application has also warn users not to push themselves to a point of pain or injury and that we are not liable should they inquire such injuries or pains from following the recommended pacer sesssion info.
Please contact us with any questions at: allvensinc@gmail.com.
